0.123456789101112131415161718192021..........

1 1-9 
2 10-99 
3 100-999
4 1000-9999
5 10000-99999
6 100000-999999
7 1000000-9999999


n*9*10^n   n:1->7
D1+D10+D100+D1000+D10000+D100000+D1000000

(10-9)/2+9  -> 1
(100-9)/2+9 -> 5
(1000-9-180)/3+99 =369  1 -> 3
(10000-9-180-2700)/4+999 = 2676  3 -> 7
(100000-9-180-2700-36000)/5+9999 = 22221 1 -> 2
(1000000-9-180-2700-36000-450000)/6+99999 = 185184  1 -> 1
1*1*5*3*7*2*1=210
